metadata.name: HeMan
metadata.description:
This is 1 NFT from my collection of paintings, that have been issued as a single, unique edition.

I have tried to convey the beauty and relief of the male body through the tone of purple, which is a bright and saturated color, and the black background, which allows me to emphasize the shapes and lines of the naked body. Also the purple color adds mystery to the picture.

size 54 x65 cm
oil on canvas
NFT + physical art
